DOC.brief_summary: Assess efficacy Avastin adjunct Diode Laser cyclophotocoagulation treatment Neovascular Glaucoma .
DOC.brief_title: Avastin Adjunct Diode Laser Treatment Neovascular Glaucoma
DOC.detailed_description: Design : Prospective , comparative interventional case series . Method : Patients randomly assign Group A treat Diode laser cyclophotocoagulation alone , whereas group B receive intravitreal Avastin ( One milligram = 0.04mL 25 mg/mL ) conjunction Diode Laser . The preoperative data include etiology , mean age ; follow period , full ophthalmological examination emphasis mean IOP , iris neovascularization , pain corneal edema .
